name: talkto.me
description:
• 15 to 20 minutes of playtime (for one playthrough) 

Tips for downloading our chatroom:

  • you need all three files in order for it to function
  • you can launch it by double clicking "takto.me.exe"

Tips for using our chatroom:

  •  Making our chatroom fullscreen will most likely trigger bugs.  
  • If you feel like you are waiting for longer than one minute, just try to click. If this doesn't do anything, try saving and restarting.

Made with Novelty.

Music by Zeeky Beats.
